thread.title: Alan Majchrowicz
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Alan Majchrowicz

author: Alan Majchrowicz
title: Alan Majchrowicz
text:
Easy to order with fast processing and shipping. However, the order arrived with no paperwork included, ie. packing slip or receipt. The mat boards I ordered arrived in perfect shape with precise flawless cuts.
One minor issue was the mat board itself. I ordered Conservation CrescentÂ® Select and did not realize that it has a slight texture to the surface. It is negligible but I would have appreciated being informed of this via the website description.
